direction.raw_text: The big creature is getting agitated and yells out some unintelligible gibberish at the now rather nervous, young adventurer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The rodent lets out a loud grunt and everything at the bar moves away. Luke tries to remain cool but it isn't easy. His three adversaries ready their weapons. Old Ben moves in behind Luke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A powerful blow from the unpleasant creature sends the young would-be Jedi sailing across the room, crashing through tables and breaking a large jug filled with a foul-looking liquid. With a blood curdling shriek, the monster draws a wicked chrome laser pistol from his belt and levels it at old Ben. The bartender panics.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With astounding agility old Ben's laser sword sparks to life and in a flash an arm lies on the floor. The rodent is cut in two and the giant multiple-eyed creature lies doubled, cut from chin to groin. Ben carefully and precisely turns off his laser sword and replaces it on his utility belt. Luke, shaking and totally amazed at the old man's abilities, attempts to stand. The entire fight has lasted only a matter of seconds. The cantina goes back to normal, although Ben is given a respectable amount of room at the bar. Luke, rubbing his bruised head, approaches the old man with new awe. Ben points the the Wookiee.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We don't serve their kind here!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Your droids. They'll have to wait outside. We don't want them here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Listen, why don't you wait out by the speeder. We don't want any trouble.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I heartily agree with you sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Negola dewaghi wooldugger?!?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He doesn't like you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm sorry.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't like you either.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't insult us. You just watch yourself. We're wanted men. I have the death sentence in twelve systems.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'll be careful than.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You'll be dead.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This little one isn't worth the effort. Come let me buy you something...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No blasters! No blaster!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This is Chewbacca. He's first-mate on a ship that might suit our needs.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Threepio paces in front of the cantina as Artoo carries on an electronic conversation with another little red astro- droid. A creature comes out of the cantina and approaches two stormtroopers in the street.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I don't like the look of this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Strange creatures play exotic big band music on odd-looking instruments as Luke, still giddy, downs a fresh drink and follows Ben and Chewbacca to a booth where Han Solo is sitting. Han is a tough, roguish starpilot about thirty years old. A mercenary on a starship, he is simple, sentimental, and cocksure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben reacts to Solo's stupid attempt to impress them with obvious misinformation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han ponders this for a few moments.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben and Luke turn around to see four Imperial stormtroopers looking at the dead bodies and asking the bartenders some questions. The bartender points to the booth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The stormtroopers look over at the booth but Luke and Ben are gone. The bartender shrugs his shoulders in puzzlement.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Han Solo. I'm captain of the Millennium Falcon. Chewie here tells me you're looking for passage to the Alderaan system.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, indeed. If it's a fast ship.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Fast ship? You've never heard of the Millennium Falcon?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Should I have?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's the ship that made the Kessel run in less than twelve parsecs!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I've outrun Imperial starships, not the local bulk-cruisers, mind you. I'm talking about the big Corellian ships now. She's fast enough for you, old man. What's the cargo?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Only passengers. Myself, the boy, two droids, and no questions asked.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What is it? Some kind of local trouble?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Let's just say we'd like to avoid any Imperial entanglements.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, that's the trick, isn't it? And it's going to cost you something extra. Ten thousand in advance.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ten thousand? We could almost buy our own ship for that!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But who's going to fly it, kid! You?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You bet I could. I'm not such a bad pilot myself! We don't have to sit here and listen...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We haven't that much with us. But we could pay you two thousand now, plus fifteen when we reach Alderaan.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Seventeen, huh!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay. You guys got yourself a ship. We'll leave as soon as you're ready. Docking bay Ninety-four.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ninety-four.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Looks like somebody's beginning to take an interest in your handiwork.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: All right, we'll check it out.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Seventeen thousand! Those guys must really be desperate. This could really save my neck. Get back to the ship and get her ready.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: You'll have to sell your speeder.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: That's okay. I'm never coming back to this planet again.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: As Han is about to leave, Greedo, a slimy green-faced alien with a short trunk-nose, pokes a gun in his side. The creature speaks in a foreign tongue translated into English subtitles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han sits down and the alien sits across from him holding the gun on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han Solo slowly reaches for his gun under the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly the slimy alien disappears in a blinding flash of light. Han pulls his smoking gun from beneath the table as the other patron look on in bemused amazement. Han gets up and starts out of the cantina, flipping the bartender some coins as he leaves.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Going somewhere, Solo?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, Greedo. As a matter of fact, I was just going to see your boss. Tell Jabba that I've got his money.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's too late. You should have paid him when you had the chance. Jabba's put a price on your head, so large that every bounty hunter in the galaxy will be looking for you. I'm lucky I found you first.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, but this time I got the money.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: If you give it to me, I might forget I found you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't have it with me. Tell Jabba...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Jabba's through with you. He has no time for smugglers who drop their shipments at the first sign of an Imperial cruiser.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Even I get boarded sometimes. Do you think I had a choice?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You can tell that to Jabba. He may only take your ship.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Over my dead body.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's the idea. I've been looking forward to killing you for a long time.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, I'll bet you have.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sorry about the mess.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Several TIE fighters approach the Death Star.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Her resistance to the mind probe is considerable. It will be some time before we can extract any information from her. An Imperial Officer interrupts the meeting.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The final check-out is complete. All systems are operational. What course shall we set?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Perhaps she would respond to an alternative form of persuasion.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What do you mean?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I think it is time we demonstrate the full power of this station. (to soldier) Set your course for Princess Leia's home planet of Alderaan.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: With pleasure.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Four heavily-armed stormtroopers move menacingly along a narrow slum alleyway crowed with darkly clad creatures hawking exotic goods in the dingy little stalls. Men, monsters, and robots crouch in the waste-filled doorways, whispering and hiding from the hot winds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One of the troopers checks a tightly locked door and moves on down the alleyway. The door slides open a crack and Threepio peeks out. Artoo is barely visible in the background.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The door opens, Threepio moves into the doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo makes beeping sounds.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Lock the door, Artoo.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: All right, check that side of the street. It's secure. Move on to the next door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I would much rather have gone with Master Luke than stay here with you. I don't know what all the trouble is about, but I'm sure it must be your fault.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You watch your language!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Ben and Luke are standing in a sleazy used speeder lot, talking with a tall, grotesque, insect-like used speeder dealer. Strange exotic bodies and spindly-legged beasts pass by as the insect concludes the sale by giving Luke some coins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben and Luke leave the speeder lot and walk down the dusty alleyway past a small robot herding a bunch of anteater-like creatures. Luke turns and gives one last forlorn look at his faithful speeder as he rounds a corner. A darkly clad creature moves out of the shadows as they pass and watches them as they disappear down another alley.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: He says it's the best he can do. Since the XP-38 came out, they're just not in demand.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It will be enough.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: If the ship's as fast as he's boasting, we ought to do well.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Jabba the Hut and a half-dozen grisly alien pirates and purple creatures stand in the middle of the docking bay. Jabba is the grossest of the slavering hulks and his scarred face is a grim testimonial to his prowess as a vicious killer. He is a fat, slug-like creature with eyes on extended feelers and a huge ugly mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A voice from directly behind the pirates startles them and they turn around to see Han Solo and the giant Wookiee, Chewbacca, standing behind them with no weapons in sight.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Come on out, Solo!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I've been waiting for you, Jabba.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I expected you would be.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm not the type to run.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (fatherly-smooth) Han, my boy, there are times when you disappoint me... why haven't you paid me? And why did you have to fry poor Greedo like that... after all we've been through together.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You sent Greedo to blast me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (mock surprise) Han, why you're the best smuggler in the business. You're too valuable to fry. He was only relaying my concern at your delays. He wasn't going to blast you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I think he thought he was. Next time don't send one of those twerps. If you've got something to say to me, come see me yourself.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Han, Han! If only you hadn't had to dump that shipment of spice... you understand I just can't make an exception. Where would I be if every pilot who smuggled for me dumped their shipment at the first sign of an Imperial starship? It's not good business.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You know, even I get boarded sometimes, Jabba. I had no choice, but I've got a charter now and I can pay you back, plus a little extra. I just need some more time.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to his men) Put your blasters away. Han, my boy, I'm only doing this because you're the best and I need you. So, for an extra, say twenty percent I'll give you a little more time... but this is it. If you disappoint me again, I'll put a price on your head so large you won't be able to go near a civilized system for the rest of your short life.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Jabba, I'll pay you because it's my pleasure.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Chewbacca waits restlessly at the entrance to Docking Bay 94.  Ben, Luke, and the robots make their way up the street. Chewbacca jabbers excitedly and signals for them to hurry. The darkly clad creature has followed them from the speeder lot.  He stops in a nearby doorway and speaks into a small transmitter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chewbacca leads the group into a giant dirt pit that is Docking Bay 94. Resting in the middle of the huge hole is a large, round, beat-up, pieced-together hunk of junk that could only loosely be called a starship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The tall figure of Han Solo comes down the boarding ramp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke scratches his head. It's obvious he isn't sure about all this. Chewbacca rushes up the ramp and urges the others to follow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The group rushes up the gang plank, passing a grinning Han Solo.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What a piece of junk.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: She'll make point five beyond the speed of light. She may not look like much, but she's got it where it counts, kid. I've added some special modifications myself.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're a little rushed, so if you'll hurry aboard we'll get out of here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Chewbacca settles into the pilot's chair and starts the mighty engines of the starship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke, Ben, Threepio, and Artoo move toward the Millennium Falcon passing Solo.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Hello, sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Eight Imperial stormtroopers rush up to the darkly clad creature.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The darkly clad creature points to the door of the docking bay.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Which way?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: All right, men. Load your weapons!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ] The troops hold their guns at the ready and charge down the docking bay entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han Solo looks up and sees the Imperial stormtroopers rushing into the docking bay. Several of the troopers fire at Han as he ducks into the spaceship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han draws his laser pistol and pops off a couple of shots which force the stormtroopers to dive for safety. The pirateship engines whine as Han hits the release button that slams the overhead entry shut.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Stop that ship!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Blast 'em!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Chewie, get us out of here! The group straps in for take off.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, my. I'd forgotten how much I hate space travel.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The half-dozen stormtroopers at a check point hear the general alarm and look to the sky as the huge starship rises above the dingy slum dwellings and quickly disappears into the morning sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han climbs into the pilot's chair next to Chewbacca, who chatters away as he points to something on the radar scope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Corellian pirateship zooms from Tatooine into space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han frantically types information into the ship's computer. Little Artoo appears momentarily at the cockpit doorway, makes a few beeping remarks, then scurries away.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: It looks like an Imperial cruiser. Our passengers must be hotter than I thought. Try and hold them off. Angle the deflector shield while I make the calculations for the jump to light speed.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Millennium Falcon pirateship races away from the yellow planet, Tatooine. It is followed by two huge Imperial stardestroyers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Over the shoulders of Chewbacca and Han, we can see the galaxy spread before them. Luke and Ben make their way into the cramped cockpit where Han continues his calculation.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Stay sharp! There are two more coming in; they're going to try to cut us off.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why don't you outrun them? I thought you said this thing was fast.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Watch your mouth, kid, or you're going to find yourself floating home. We'll be safe enough once we make the jump to hyperspace. Besides, I know a few maneuvers. We'll lose them!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Imperial cruisers fire at the pirateship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ship shudders as an explosion flashes outside the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ship begins to rock violently as lasers hit it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ship is now constantly battered with laserfire as a red warning light begins to flash.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The galaxy brightens and they move faster, almost as if crashing a barrier. Stars become streaks as the pirateship makes the jump to hyperspace.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Here's where the fun begins!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: How long before you can make the jump to light speed?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It'll take a few moments to get the coordinates from the navi-computer.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Are you kidding? At the rate they're gaining...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Traveling through hyperspace isn't like dusting crops, boy! Without precise calculations we could fly right through a star or bounce too close to a supernova and that'd end your trip real quick, wouldn't it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's that flashing?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're losing our deflector shield. Go strap yourself in, I'm going to make the jump to light speed.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Millennium Falcon zooms into infinity in less than a second.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alderaan looms behind the Death Star battlestation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Admiral Motti enters the quiet control room and bows before Governor Tarkin, who stands before the huge wall screen displaying a small green planet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader and two stormtroopers enter with Princess Leia. Her hands are bound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tarkin waves menacingly toward Leia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leia overhears an intercom voice announcing the approach to Alderaan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leia lowers her head.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We've entered the Alderaan system.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Governor Tarkin, I should have expected to find you holding Vader's leash. I recognized your foul stench when I was brought on board.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Charming to the last. You don't know how hard I found it signing the order to terminate your life!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I surprised you had the courage to take the responsibility yourself!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Princess Leia, before your execution I would like you to be my guest at a ceremony that will make this battle station operational. No star system will dare oppose the Emperor now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The more you tighten your grip, Tarkin, the more star systems will slip through your fingers.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Not after we demonstrate the power of this station. In a way, you have determined the choice of the planet that'll be destroyed first. Since you are reluctant to provide us with the location of the Rebel base, I have chosen to test this station's destructive power... on your home planet of Alderaan.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No! Alderaan is peaceful. We have no weapons. You can't possibly...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You would prefer another target? A military target? Then name the system!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I grow tired of asking this. So it'll be the last time. Where is the Rebel base?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (softly) Dantooine.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They're on Dantooine.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There. You see Lord Vader, she can be reasonable. (addressing Motti) Continue with the operation. You may fire when ready.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're far too trusting. Dantooine is too remote to make an effective demonstration. But don't worry. We will deal with your Rebel friends soon enough.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Commence primary ignition. A button is pressed which switches on a panel of lights. A hooded Imperial soldier reaches overhead and pulls a lever. Another lever is pulled. Vader reaches for still another lever and a bank of lights on a panel and wall light up. A huge beam of light emanates from within a cone-shaped area and converges into a single laser beam out toward Alderaan. The small green planet of Alderaan is blown into space dust.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben watches Luke practice the lightsaber with a small "seeker" robot. Ben suddenly turns away and sits down. He falters, seems almost faint.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben rubs his forehead. He seems to drift into a trance. Then he fixes his gaze on Luke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han Solo enters the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke is once again practicing with the lightsaber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Threepio watches Chewbacca and Artoo who are engrossed in a game in which three-dimensional holographic figures move along a chess-type board.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chewbacca and the two robots sit around the lighted table covered with small holographic monsters. Each side of the table has a small computer monitor embedded in it. Chewbacca seems very pleased with himself as he rests his lanky fur- covered arms over his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo immediately reaches up and taps the computer with his stubby claw hand, causing one of the holographic creatures to walk to the new square. A sudden frown crosses Chewbacca's face and he begins yelling gibberish at the tiny robot. Threepio intercedes on behalf of his small companion and begins to argue with the huge Wookiee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke stands in the middle of the small hold area; he seems frozen in place. A humming lightsaber is held high over his head. Ben watches him from the corner, studying his movements. Han watches with a bit of smugness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suspended at eye level, about ten feet in front of Luke, a "seeker", a chrome baseball-like robot covered with antennae, hovers slowly in a wide arc. The ball floats to one side of the youth then the other. Suddenly it makes a lightning-swift lunge and stops within a few feet of Luke's face. Luke doesn't move and the ball backs off. It slowly moves behind the boy, then makes another quick lunge, this time emitting a blood red laser beam as it attacks. It hits Luke in the leg causing him to tumble over. Han lets loose with a burst of laughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben smiles quietly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben places a large helmet on Luke's head which covers his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han skeptically shakes his head as Ben throws the seeker into the air. The ball shoots straight up in the air, then drops like a rock. Luke swings the lightsaber around blindly missing the seeker, which fires off a laserbolt which hits Luke square on the seat of the pants. He lets out a painful yell and attempts to hit the seeker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke stands in one place, seemingly frozen. The seeker makes a dive at Luke and, incredibly, he managed to deflect the bolt. The ball ceases fire and moves back to its original position.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Solo notices a small light flashing on the far side of the control panel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han and Chewbacca head back to the cockpit.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Are you all right? What's wrong?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I felt a great disturbance in the Force... as if millions of voices suddenly cried out in terror and were suddenly silenced. I fear something terrible has happened.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You'd better get on with your exercises.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, you can forget your troubles with those Imperial slugs. I told you I'd outrun 'em.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't everyone thank me at once.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Anyway, we should be at Alderaan about oh-two-hundred hours.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Now be careful, Artoo.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He made a fair move. Screaming about it won't help you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (interrupting) Let him have it. It's not wise to upset a Wookiee.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But sir, nobody worries about upsetting a droid.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's 'cause droids don't pull people's arms out of their socket when they lose. Wookiees are known to do that.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I see your point, sir. I suggest a new strategy, Artoo. Let the Wookiee win.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Remember, a Jedi can feel the Force flowing through him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You mean it controls your actions?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Partially. But it also obeys your commands.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side, kid.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You don't believe in the Force, do you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Kid, I've flown from one side of this galaxy to the other. I've seen a lot of strange stuff, but I've never seen anything to make me believe there's one all-powerful force controlling everything. There's no mystical energy field that controls my destiny.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's all a lot of simple tricks and nonsense.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I suggest you try it again, Luke.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This time, let go your conscious self and act on instinct.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (laughing) With the blast shield down, I can't even see. How am I supposed to fight?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Your eyes can deceive you. Don't trust them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Stretch out with your feelings.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You see, you can do it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I call it luck.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: In my experience, there's no such thing as luck.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Look, going good against remotes is one thing. Going good against the living? That's something else.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Looks like we're coming up on Alderaan.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You know, I did feel something. I could almost see the remote.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's good. You have taken your first step into a larger world.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Imperial Officer Cass stands before Governor Tarkin and the evil Dark Lord Darth Vader.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Yes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Our scout ships have reached Dantooine. They found the remains of a Rebel base, but they estimate that it has been deserted for some time. They are now conducting an extensive search of the surrounding systems.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: She lied! She lied to us!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I told you she would never consciously betray the Rebellion.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Terminate her... immediately!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The pirateship is just coming out of hyperspace; a strange surreal light show surrounds the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stand by, Chewie, here we go. Cut in the sublight engines. Han pulls back on a control lever. Outside the cockpit window stars begin streaking past, seem to decrease in speed, then stop. Suddenly the starship begins to shudder and violently shake about. Asteroids begin to race toward them, battering the sides of the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Wookiee flips off several controls and seems very cool in the emergency. Luke makes his way into the bouncing cockpit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben moves into the cockpit behind Luke as the ship begins to settle down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A signal starts flashing on the control panel and a muffled alarm starts humming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chewbacca barks his concern. A huge explosion bursts outside the cockpit window, shaking the ship violently. A tiny, finned Imperial TIE fighter races past the cockpit window.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What the...? Aw, we've come out of hyperspace into a meteor shower. Some kind of asteroid collision. It's not on any of the charts.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's going on?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Our position is correct, except... no, Alderaan!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What do you mean? Where is it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Thats what I'm trying to tell you, kid. It ain't there. It's been totally blown away.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What? How?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Destroyed... by the Empire!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The entire starfleet couldn't destroy the whole planet. It'd take a thousand ships with more fire power than I've...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's another ship coming in.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Maybe they know what happened.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's an Imperial fighter.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It followed us!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No. It's a short range fighter.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There aren't any bases around here. Where did it come from?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The fighter races past the Corellian pirateship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It sure is leaving in a big hurry. If they identify us, we're in big trouble.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Not if I can help it. Chewie...jam it's transmissions.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It'd be as well to let it go. It's too far out of range.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Not for long...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The pirateship zooms over the camera and away into the vastness of space after the Imperial TIE fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The tension mounts as the pirateship gains on the tiny fighter. In the distance, one of the stars becomes brighter until it is obvious that the TIE ship is heading for it. Ben stands behind Chewbacca.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: A fighter that size couldn't get this deep into space on its own.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It must have gotten lost, been part of a convoy or something.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, he ain't going to be around long enough to tell anyone about us.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The TIE fighter is losing ground to the larger pirateship as they race toward camera and disappear over head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The distant star can be distinguished as a small moon or planet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The small moon begins to take on the appearance of a monstrous spherical battle station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The pirateship shudders and the TIE fighter accelerates away toward the gargantuan battle station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben Kenobi puts a hand on his shoulder.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Look at him. He's headed for that small moon.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I think I can get him before he gets there... he's almost in range.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's no moon! It's a space station.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's too big to be a space station.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I have a very bad feeling about this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, I think your right. Full reverse! Chewie, lock in the auxiliary power.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why are we still moving towards it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're caught in a tractor beam! It's pulling us in!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But there's gotta be something you can do!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's nothin' I can do about it, kid. I'm in full power. I'm going to have to shut down. But they're not going to get me without a fight!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You can't win. But there are alternatives to fighting.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: As the battered pirate starship is towed closer to the awesome metal moon, the immense size of the massive battle station becomes staggering. Running along the equator of the gigantic sphere is a mile-high band of huge docking ports into which the helpless pirateship is dragged.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The helpless Millennium Falcon is pulled past a docking port control room and huge laser turret cannons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clear Bay twenty-three-seven. We are opening the magnetic field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The pirateship is pulled in through port doors of the Death Star, coming to rest in a huge hangar. Thirty stormtroopers stand at attention in a central assembly area.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: To you stations! (to another officer) Come with me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Stormtroopers run to their posts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A line of stormtroopers march toward the pirateship in readiness to board it, while other troopers stand with weapons ready to fire.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Close all outboard shields! Close all outboard shields!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Tarkin pushes a button and responds to the intercom buzz.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Yes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over intercom) We've captured a freighter entering the remains of the Alderaan system. It's markings match those of a ship that blasted its way out of Mos Eisley.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They must be trying to return the stolen plans to the princess. She may yet be of some use to us.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vader and a commander approach the troops as an Officer and several heavily armed troops exit the spacecraft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader turns quickly and exits the hangar.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over intercom) Unlock one-five-seven and nine. Release charges.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Vader) There's no one on board, sir. According to the log, the crew abandoned ship right after takeoff. It must be a decoy, sir. Several of the escape pods have been jettisoned.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Did you find any droids?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No, sir. If there were any on board, they must also have jettisoned.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Send a scanning crew on board. I want every part of this ship checked.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes, sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I sense something... a presence I haven't felt since...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Get me a scanning crew in here on the double. I want every part of this ship checked!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A trooper runs through the hallway heading for the exit. In a few moments all is quiet. The muffled sounds of a distant officer giving orders finally fade. Two floor panels suddenly pop up revealing Han Solo and Luke. Ben Kenobi sticks his head out of a third locker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han shakes his head, muttering to himself. Chewbacca agrees.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Boy, it's lucky you had these compartments.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I use them for smuggling. I never thought I'd be smuggling myself in them. This is ridiculous. Even if I could take off, I'd never get past the tractor beam.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Leave that to me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Damn fool. I knew that you were going to say that!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who's the more foolish... the fool or the fool who follows him?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The crewmen carry a heavy box on board the ship, past the two stormtroopers guarding either side of the ramp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The crewmen enter the pirateship and a loud crashing sound is followed by a voice calling to the guard below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The stormtroopers enter the ship and a quick round of gunfire is heard.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The ship's all yours. If the scanners pick up anything, report it immediately. All right, let's go.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey down there, could you give us a hand with this?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: In a very small command office near the entrance to the pirateship, a Gantry Officer looks out his window and notices the guards are missing. He speaks into the comlink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A stormtrooper comes down the ramp of the pirateship and waves to the gantry officer, pointing to his ear indicating his comlink is not working. The gantry officer shakes his head in disgust and heads for the door, giving his aide an annoyed look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the officer approaches the door, it slides open revealing the towering Chewbacca. The gantry officer, in a momentary state of shock, stumbles backward. With a bone- chilling howl, the giant Wookiee flattens the officer with one blow. The aide immediately reaches for his pistol, but is blasted by Han, dressed as an Imperial stormtrooper. Ben and the robots enter the room quickly followed by Luke, also dressed as a stormtrooper. Luke quickly removes his helmet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben feeds some information into the computer and a map of the city appears on the monitor. He begins to inspect it carefully. Threepio and Artoo look over the control panel. Artoo finds something that makes him whistle wildly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo punches his claw arm into the computer socket and the vast Imperial brain network comes to life, feeding information to the little robot. After a few moments, he beeps something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The computer monitor flashes readouts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben studies the data on the monitor readout.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben adjusts the lightsaber on his belt and silently steps out of the command office, then disappears down a long grey hallway. Chewbacca barks a comment and Han shakes his head in agreement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han looks at Luke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly Artoo begins to whistle and beep a blue streak. Luke goes over to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo whistles a frantic reply.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chewbacca growls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han looks at Chewie, who grunts a short grunt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke moves toward Chewbacca with electronic cuffs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chewie lets out a hideous growl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke sheepishly hands the binders to Han.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Wookiee has a worried and frightened look on his face as Han binds him with the electronic cuffs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke and Han put on their armored stormtrooper helmets and start off into the giant Imperial Death Star.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: TX-four-one-two. Why aren't you at your post? TX-four-one-two, do you copy?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Take over. We've got a bad transmitter. I'll see what I can do.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You know, between his howling and your blasting everything in sight, it's a wonder the whole station doesn't know we're here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Bring them on! I prefer a straight fight to all this sneaking around.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We found the computer outlet, sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Plug in. He should be able to interpret the entire Imperial computer network.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He says he's found the main computer to power the tractor beam that's holding the ship here. He'll try to make the precise location appear on the monitor.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The tractor beam is coupled to the main reactor in seven locations. A power loss at one of the terminals will allow the ship to leave.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't think you boys can help. I must go alone.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Whatever you say. I've done more that I bargained for on this trip already.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I want to go with you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Be patient, Luke. Stay and watch over the droids.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But he can...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They must be delivered safely or other star systems will suffer the same fate as Alderaan. Your destiny lies along a different path than mine. The Force will be with you... always!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Boy you said it, Chewie.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where did you dig up that old fossil?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ben is a great man.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yeah, great at getting us into trouble.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I didn't hear you give any ideas...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, anything would be better than just hanging around waiting for him to pick us up...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who do you think...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What is it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm afraid I'm not quite sure, sir. He says "I found her", and keeps repeating, "She's here."
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, who... who has he found?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Princess Leia.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The princess? She's here?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Princess? What's going on?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Level five. Detention block A A-twenty- three. I'm afraid she's scheduled to be terminated.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, no! We've got to do something.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What are you talking about?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The droid belongs to her. She's the one in the message... We've got to help her.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Now, look, don't get any funny ideas. The old man wants us to wait right here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But he didn't know she was here. Look, will you just find a way back into the detention block?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm not going anywhere.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They're going to execute her. Look, a few minutes ago you said you didn't want to just wait here to be captured. Now all you want to do is stay.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Marching into the detention area is not what I had in mind.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: But they're going to kill her!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Better her than me...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: She's rich.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Rich?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes. Rich, powerful! Listen, if you were to rescue her, the reward would be...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well more wealth that you can imagine.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't know, I can imagine quite a bit!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You'll get it!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I better!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You will...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: All right, kid. But you'd better be right about this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: All right.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's your plan?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Uh... Threepio, hand me those binders there will you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay. Now, I'm going to put these on you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay. Han, you put these on.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't worry, Chewie. I think I know what he has in mind.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Master Luke, sir! Pardon me for asking... but, ah... what should Artoo and I do if we're discovered here?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Lock the door!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: And hope they don't have blasters.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That isn't very reassuring.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Han and Luke try to look inconspicuous in their armored suits as they wait for a vacuum elevator to arrive. Troops, bureaucrats, and robots bustle about, ignoring the trio completely. Only a few give the giant Wookiee a curious glance. Finally a small elevator arrives and the trio enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A bureaucrat races to get aboard also, but is signaled away by Han. The door to the pod-like vehicle slides closed and the elevator car takes off through a vacuum tube.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I can't see a thing in this helmet.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Several Imperial officers walk through the wide main passageway. They pass several stormtroopers and a robot similar to Threepio but with an insect face. At the far end of the hallway, a passing flash of Ben Kenobi appears, then disappears down a small hallway. His appearance is so fleeting that it is hard to tell if he is real or just an illusion. No one in the hallway seems to notice him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke and Han step forward to exit the elevator, but the door slides open behind them. The giant Wookiee and his two guards enter the old grey security station. Guards and laser gates are everywhere. Han whispers to Luke under his breath.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: This is not going to work.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Why didn't you say so before?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I did say so before!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Elevator doors open. A tall, grim looking Officer approaches the trio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chewie growls a bit at the remark but Han nudges him to shut up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The officer goes back to his console and begins to punch in the information. There are only three other troopers in the area. Luke and Han survey the situation, checking all of the alarms, laser gates, and camera eyes. Han unfastens one of Chewbacca's electronic cuffs and shrugs to Luke. Suddenly Chewbacca throws up his hands and lets out with one of his ear-piercing howls. He grabs Han's laser rifle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The startled guards are momentarily dumbfounded. Luke and Han have already pulled out their laser pistols and are blasting away at the terrifying Wookiee. Their barrage of laserfire misses Chewbacca, but hits the camera eyes, laser gate controls, and the Imperial guards. The officer is the last of the guards to fall under the laserfire just as he is about to push the alarm system. Han rushes to the comlink system, which is screeching questions about what is going on.  He quickly checks the computer readout.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke races down one of the cell corridors. Han speaks into the buzzing comlink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han blasts the comlink and it explodes.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Where are you taking this... thing?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Prisoner transfer from Block one-one- three-eight.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I wasn't notified. I'll have to clear it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Look out! He's loose!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He's going to pull us all apart.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Go get him!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We've got to find out which cell this princess of yours is in. Here it is... cell twenty-one-eight-seven. You go get her. I'll hold them here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (sounding official) Everything is under control. Situation normal.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What happened?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (getting nervous) Uh... had a slight weapons malfunction. But, uh, everything's perfectly all right now. We're fine. We're all fine here, now, thank you. How are you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're sending a squad up.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Uh, uh, negative. We had a reactor leak here now. Give us a few minutes to lock it down. Large leak... very dangerous.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who is this? What's your operating number?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Boring conversation anyway. (yelling down the hall) Luke! We're going to have company!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke stops in front of one of the cells and blasts the door away with a laser pistol. When the smoke clears, Luke sees the dazzling young princess-senator. She had been sleeping and is now looking at him with an uncomprehending look on her face. Luke is stunned by her incredible beauty and stands staring at her with his mouth hanging open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke takes off his helmet, coming out of it.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (finally) Aren't you a little short to be a stormtrooper?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What? Oh... the uniform. I'm Luke Skywalker. I'm here to rescue you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're who?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm here to rescue you. I've got your R2 unit. I'm here with Ben Kenobi.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Ben Kenobi is here! Where is he?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Come on!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Darth Vader paces the room as Governor Tarkin sits at the far end of the conference table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is a quiet buzz on the comlink.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: He is here...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Obi-Wan Kenobi! What makes you think so?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: A tremor in the Force. The last time I felt it was in the presence of my old master.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Surely he must be dead by now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't underestimate the power of the Force.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The Jedi are extinct, their fire has gone out of the universe. You, my friend, are all that's left of their religion.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Yes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Governor Tarkin, we have an emergency alert in detention block A A-twenty- three.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The princess! Put all sections on alert!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Obi-Wan is here. The Force is with him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: If you're right, he must not be allowed to escape.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Escape is not his plan. I must face him alone.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: An ominous buzzing sound is heard on the other side of the elevator door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chewbacca responds with a growling noise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A series of explosions knock a hole in the elevator door through which several Imperial troops begin to emerge. Han and Chewie fire laser pistols at them through the smoke and flame. They turn and run down the cell hallway, meeting up with Luke and Leia rushing toward them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke takes a small comlink transmitter from his belt as they continue to exchange fire with stormtroopers making their way down the corridor.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Chewie!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Get behind me! Get behind me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Can't get out that way.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Looks like you managed to cut off our only escape route.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (sarcastically) Maybe you'd like it back in your cell, Your Highness.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: See-Threepio! See-Threepio!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over comlink) Yes sir?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We've been cut off! Are there any other ways out of the cell bay?... What was that? I didn't copy!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Threepio paces the control center as little Artoo beeps and whistles a blue streak. Threepio yells into the small comlink transmitter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone begins banging on the door.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I said, all systems have been alerted to your presence, sir. The main entrance seems to be the only way in or out; all other information on your level is restricted.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Open up in there!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, no!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke and Leia crouch together in an alcove for protection as they continue to exchange fire with troops. Han and Chewbacca are barely able to keep the stormtroopers at bay at the far and of the hallway. The laserfire is very intense, and smoke fills the narrow cell corridor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke manages a sheepish grin and shrugs his shoulders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The princess grabs Luke's gun and fires at a small grate in the wall next to Han, almost frying him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She jumps through the narrow opening as Han and Chewbacca look on in amazement. Chewbacca sniffs the garbage chute and says something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han gives him a kick and the Wookiee disappears into the tiny opening. Luke and Han continue firing as they work their way toward the opening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke ducks laserfire as he jumps into the darkness. Han fires off a couple of quick blasts creating a smokey cover, then slides into the chute himself and is gone.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: There isn't any other way out.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I can't hold them off forever! Now what?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This is some rescue. When you came in here, didn't you have a plan for getting out?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (pointing to Luke) He's the brains, sweetheart.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, I didn't...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What the hell are you doing?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Somebody has to save our skins. Into the garbage chute, wise guy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Get in there you big furry oaf! I don't care what you smell! Get in there and don't worry about it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Wonderful girl! Either I'm going to kill her or I'm beginning to like her. Get in there!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Han tumbles into the large room filled with garbage and muck. Luke is already stumbling around looking for an exit. He finds a small hatchway and struggles to get it open. It won't budge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han draws his laser pistol and fires at the hatch. The laserbolt ricochets wildly around the small metal room. Everyone dives for cover in the garbage as the bolt explodes almost on top of them. Leia climbs out of the garbage with a rather grim look on her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A loud, horrible, inhuman moan works its way up from the murky depths. Chewbacca lets out a terrified howl and begins to back away. Han and Luke stand fast with their laser pistols drawn. The Wookiee is cowering near one of the walls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly Luke is yanked under the garbage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Solo tries to get to Luke. Luke surfaces with a gasp of air and thrashing of limbs. A membrane tentacle is wrapped around his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leia extends a long pipe toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Solo fires his gun downward. Luke is pulled back into the muck by the slimy tentacle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly the walls of the garbage receptacle shudder and move in a couple of inches. Then everything is deathly quiet. Han and Leia give each other a worried look as Chewbacca howls in the corner. With a rush of bubbles and muck Luke suddenly bobs to the surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke seems to be released by the thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Before anyone can say anything the walls begin to rumble and edge toward the Rebels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They place poles and long metal beams between the closing walls, but they are simply snapped and bent as the giant trashmasher rumbles on. The situation doesn't look too good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke pulls out his comlink.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (sarcastically) Oh! The garbage chute was a really wonderful idea. What an incredible smell you've discovered! Let's get out of here! Get away from there...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No! wait!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Will you forget it? I already tried it. It's magnetically sealed!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Put that thing away! You're going to get us all killed.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Absolutely, Your Worship. Look, I had everything under control until you led us down here. You know, it's not going to take them long to figure out what happened to us.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It could be worse...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's worse.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's something alive in here!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's your imagination.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Something just moves past my leg! Look! Did you see that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Help!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Luke! Luke! Luke!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Luke!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Luke, Luke, grab a hold of this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Blast it, will you! My gun's jammed.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Anywhere! Oh!!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Luke! Luke!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Grab him!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What happened?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I don't know, it just let go of me and disappeared...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I've got a very bad feeling about this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The walls are moving!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't just stand there. Try to brace it with something.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Wait a minute!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Threepio! Come in Threepio! Threepio! Where could he be?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A soft buzzer and the muted voice of Luke calling out for See-Threepio can be heard on Threepio's hand comlink, which is sitting on the deserted computer console. Artoo and Threepio are nowhere in sight. Suddenly there is a great explosion and the door of the control tower flies across the floor. Four armed stormtroopers enter the chamber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A trooper pushes a button and the supply cabinet door slides open. See-Threepio and Artoo-Detoo are inside. Artoo follows his bronze companion out into the office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The troops hustle off down the hallway, leaving a guard to watch over the command office.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The guard aims a blaster at them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The guard nods and Threepio, with little Artoo in tow, hurries out the door.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Take over! (pointing to the dead officer) See to him! Look there!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They're madmen! They're heading for the prison level. If you hurry, you might catch them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to his troops) Follow me! You stand guard.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Artoo) Come on!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh! All this excitement has overrun the circuits of my counterpart here. If you don't mind, I'd like to take him down to maintenance.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: All right.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: As the walls rumble closed, the room gets smaller and smaller. Chewie is whining and trying to hold a wall back with his giant paws. Han is leaning back against the other wall. Garbage is snapping and popping. Luke is trying to reach Threepio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han and Leia try to brace the contracting walls with a pole. Leia begins to sink into the trash.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Threepio! Come in, Threepio! Threepio!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Get to the top!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I can't
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where could he be? Threepio! Threepio, will you come in?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: EL
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Little Artoo carefully plugs his claw arm into a new wall socket and a complex array of electronic sounds spew from the tiny robot.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: They aren't here! Something must have happened to them. See if they've been captured.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hurry!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The walls are only feet apart. Leia and Han are braced against the walls. The princess is frightened. They look at each other. Leia reaches out and takes Han's hand and she holds it tightly. She's terrified and suddenly groans as she feels the first crushing pressure against her body.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: One thing's for sure. We're all going to be a lot thinner! (to Leia) Get on top of it!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm trying!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: EL
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo frantically beeps something to See-Threepio.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (to Artoo) Thank goodness, they haven't found them! Where could they be?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Use the comlink? Oh, my! I forgot I turned it off!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Meanwhile, Luke is lying on his side, trying to keep his head above the rising ooze. Luke's comlink begins to buzz and he rips it off his belt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: EL Muffled sounds of Luke's voice over the comlink can be heard, but not distinctly.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Are you there, sir?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Threepio!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: EL
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We've had some problems...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over comlink) Will you shut up and listen to me? Shut down all garbage mashers on the detention level, will you? Do you copy?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Shut down all the garbage mashers on the detention level.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: EL
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Threepio holds his head in agony as he hears the incredible screaming and hollering from Luke's comlink.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over comlink) Shut down all the garbage mashers on the detention level.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Artoo) No. Shut them all down! Hurry!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Listen to them! They're dying, Artoo! Curse my metal body! I wasn't fast enough. It's all my fault! My poor master!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over comlink) Threepio, we're all right!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The screaming and hollering is the sound of joyous relief. The walls have stopped moving. Han, Chewie and Leia embrace in the background.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke moves to the pressure sensitive hatch, looking for a number.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We're all right. You did great.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey... hey, open the pressure maintenance hatch on unit number... where are we?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: EL
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over comlink) Three-two-six-eight-two-seven.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Ben enters a humming service trench that powers the huge tractor beam. The trench seems to be a hundred miles deep. The clacking sound of huge switching devices can be heard. The old Jedi edges his his way along a narrow ledge leading to a control panel that connects two large cables. He carefully makes several adjustments in the computer terminal, and several lights on the board go from red to blue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The group exits the garbage room into a dusty, unused hallway. Han and Luke remove the trooper suits and strap on the blaster belts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke smiles and scratches his head as he takes a blaster from Solo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chewie begins growling and points to the hatch to the garbage room, as he runs away and then stops howling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Dia Nogu bangs against the hatch and a long, slimy tentacle works its way out of the doorway searching for a victim. Han aims his pistol.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han fires at the doorway. The noise of the blast echoes relentlessly throughout the empty passageway. Luke simply shakes his head in disgust.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chewie shakes his head "no."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han is stunned at the command of the petite young girl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han watches her start away. He looks at Luke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They follow her, moving swiftly down the deserted corridor.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: If we can just avoid any more female advice, we ought to be able to get out of here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, let's get moving!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Chewie) Where are you going?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No, wait. They'll hear!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Chewie) Come here, you big coward!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Chewie! Come here!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Listen. I don't know who you are, or where you came from, but from now on, you do as I tell you. Okay?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Look, Your Worshipfulness, let's get one thing straight! I take orders from one person! Me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's a wonder you're still alive. (looking at Chewie) Will somebody get this big walking carpet out of my way?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No reward is worth this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Suddenly a door behind Ben slides open and a detachment of stormtroopers marches to the power trench. Ben instantly slips into the shadows as an Officer moves to within a few feet of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All but two of the stormtroopers leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben moves around the tractor beam, watching the stormtroopers as they turn their backs to him. Ben gestures with his hand toward them, as the troops think they hear something in the other hallway. With the help of the Force, Ben deftly slips past the troopers and into the main hallway.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Secure this area until the alert is canceled.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Give me regular reports.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Do you know what's going on?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Maybe it's another drill.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What was that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, it's nothing. Don't worry about it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke, Han, Chewbacca, and Leia run down an empty hallway and stop before a bay window overlooking the pirateship. Troopers are milling about the ship. Luke takes out his pocket comlink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han is watching the dozen or so troops moving in and out of the pirateship. Leia moves towards Han, touches his arm and points out the window to the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han gives her a dirty look, and they start off down the hallway. They round a corner and run right into twenty Imperial stormtroopers heading toward them. Both groups are taken by surprise and stop in their tracks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Before even thinking, Han draws his laser pistol and charges the troops, firing. His blaster knocks one of the stormtroopers into the air. Chewie follows his captain down the corridor, stepping over the fallen trooper on the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han has already rounded a corner and does not hear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke is furious but doesn't have time to think about it for muted alarms begin to go off down on the hangar deck. Luke and Leia start off toward the starship hangar.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (looking at his ship) There she is.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: See-Threepio, do you copy?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (voice) For the moment. Uh, we're in the main hangar across from the ship.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're right above you. Stand by.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You came in that thing? You're braver that I thought.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Nice! Come on!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's them! Blast them!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Luke and Leia) Get back to the ship!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where are you going? Come back!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He certainly has courage.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What good will it do us if he gets himself killed? Come on!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Han chases the stormtroopers down a long subhallway. He is yelling and brandishing his laser pistol. The troops reach a dead end and are forced to turn and fight. Han stops a few feet from them and assumes a defensive position. The troops begin to raise their laser guns. Soon all ten troopers are moving into an attack position in front of the lone starpirate. Han's determined look begins to fade as the troops begin to advance. Solo jumps backward as they fire at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chewbacca runs down the subhallway in a last-ditch attempt to save his bold captain. Suddenly he hears the firing of laser guns and yelling. Around the corner shoots Han, pirate extraordinaire, running for his life, followed by a host of furious stormtroopers. Chewbacca turns and starts running the other way also.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke fires his laser pistol wildly as he and Leia rush down a narrow subhallway, chased by several stormtroopers. They quickly reach the end of the subhallway and race through an open hatchway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke and Leia race through the hatch onto a narrow bridge that spans a huge, deep shaft that seems to go into infinity. The bridge has been retracted into the wall of the shaft, and Luke almost rushes into the abyss. He loses his balance off the end of the bridge as Leia, behind him, takes hold of his arm and pulls him back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blasts from the stormtroopers' laser guns explode nearby reminding them of the oncoming danger. Luke fires back at the advancing troops. Leia reaches over and hits a switch that pops the hatch door shut with a resounding boom, leaving them precariously perched on a short piece of bridge overhang. Laserfire from the troopers continues to hit the steel door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke blasts the controls with his laser pistol.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks at the blasted bridge control while the stormtroopers on the opposite side of the door begin making ominous drilling and pounding sounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke notices something on his stormtrooper belt, when laserfire hits the wall behind him. Luke aims his laser pistol at a stormtrooper perched on a higher bridge overhang across the abyss from them. They exchange fire. Two more troops appear on another overhang, also firing. A trooper is hit, and grabs at his chest. Another trooper standing on the bridge overhang is hit by Luke's laserfire, and plummets down the shaft. Troopers move back off the bridge; Luke hands the gun to Leia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke pulls a thin nylon cable from his trooper utility belt. It has a grappler hook on it. A trooper appears on a bridge overhang and fires at Luke and Leia. As Luke works with the rope, Leia returns the laser volley. Another trooper appears and fires at them, as Leia returns his fire as well. Suddenly, the hatch door begins to open, revealing the feet of more troops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leia hits one of the stormtroopers on the bridge above, and he falls into the abyss. Luke tosses the rope across the gorge and it wraps itself around an outcropping of pipes. He tugs on the rope to make sure it is secure, then grabs the princess in his arms. Leia looks at Luke, then kisses him quickly on the lips. Luke is very surprised.
