direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke pushes off and they swing across the treacherous abyss to the corresponding hatchway on the opposite side. Just as Luke and Leia reach the far side of the canyon, the stormtroopers break through the hatch and begin to fire at the escaping duo. Luke returns the fire before ducking into the tiny subhallway.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (gasping) I think we took a wrong turn.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There's no lock!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That oughta hold it for a while.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Quick, we've got to get across. Find the control that extends the bridge.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, I think I just blasted it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They're coming through!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Here, hold this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Here they come!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: For luck!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Ben hides in the shadows of the narrow passageway as several stormtroopers rush past him in the main hallway. He checks to make sure they're gone, then runs down the hallway in the opposite direction. Darth Vader appears at the far end of the hallway and starts after the old Jedi.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Threepio looks around at the troops milling about the pirateship entry ramp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo, plugged into the computer socket, turns his dome left and right, beeping a response.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Where could they be?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Han and Chewbacca run down a long corridor with several troopers hot on their trail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At the end of the hallway, blast doors begin to close in front of them. The young starpilot and his furry companion race past the huge doors just as they are closing, and manage to get off a couple off laserblasts at the pursuing troops before the doors slam shut.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Close the blast doors!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Open the blast doors! Open the blast doors!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Ben hurries along one of the tunnels leading to the hangar where the pirateship waits. Just before he reaches the hangar, Darth Vader steps into view at the end of the tunnel, not ten feet away. Vader lights his saber. Ben also ignites his and steps slowly forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ben Kenobi moves with elegant ease into a classical offensive position. The fearsome Dark Knight takes a defensive stance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The two Galactic warriors stand perfectly still for a few moments, sizing each other up and waiting for the right moment. Ben seems to be under increasing pressure and strain, as if an invisible weight were being placed upon him. He shakes his head and, blinking, tries to clear his eyes. Ben makes a sudden lunge at the huge warrior but is checked by a lightning movement of The Sith. A masterful slash stroke by Vader is blocked by the old Jedi. Another of the Jedi's blows is blocked, then countered. Ben moves around the Dark Lord and starts backing into the massive starship hangar. The two powerful warriors stand motionless for a few moments with laser swords locked in mid-air, creating a low buzzing sound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Their lightsabers continue to meet in combat.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: INT.
location: HALLWAY LEADING TO MAIN FORWARD BAY

dialogue.raw_text: I've been waiting for you, Obi-Wan. We meet again, at last. The circle is now complete.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: When I left you, I was but the learner; now I am the master.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Only a master of evil, Darth.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Your powers are weak, old man.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You can't win, Darth. If you strike me down, I shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Han Solo and Chewbacca, their weapons in hand, lean back against the wall surveying the forward bay, watching the Imperial stormtroopers make their rounds of the hangar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chewbacca growls a reply, as Luke and the princess join them.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Didn't we just leave this party?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What kept you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We ran into some old friends.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Is the ship all right?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Seems okay, if we can get to it. Just hope the old man got the tractor beam out of commission.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vader and Ben Kenobi continue their powerful duel. As they hit their lightsabers together, lightning flashes on impact. Troopers look on in interest as the old Jedi and Dark Lord of The Sith fight. Suddenly Luke spots the battle from his group's vantage point.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke, Leia, Han, and Chewie look up and see Ben and Vader emerging from the hallways on the far side of the docking bay.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Look!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Threepio and Artoo-Detoo are in the center of the Death Star's Imperial docking bay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Threepio ducks out of sight as the seven stormtroopers who were guarding the starship rush past them heading towards Ben and The Sith Knight. He pulls on Artoo.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Come on, Artoo, we're going!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Solo, Chewie, Luke, and Leia tensely watch the duel. The troops rush toward the battling knights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They start for the Millennium Falcon. Ben sees the troops charging toward him and realizes that he is trapped. Vader takes advantage of Ben's momentary distraction and brings his mighty lightsaber down on the old man. Ben manages to deflect the blow and swiftly turns around. The old Jedi Knight looks over his shoulder at Luke, lifts his sword from Vader's then watches his opponent with a serene look on his face. Vader brings his sword down, cutting old Ben in half. Ben's cloak falls to the floor in two parts, but Ben is not in it. Vader is puzzled at Ben's disappearance and pokes at the empty cloak. As the guards are distracted, the adventurers and the robots reach the starship. Luke sees Ben cut in two and starts for him. Aghast, he yells out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The stormtroopers turn toward Luke and begin firing at him. The robots are already moving up the ramp into the Millennium Falcon, while Luke, transfixed by anger and awe, returns their fire. Solo joins in the laserfire. Vader looks up and advances toward them, as one of his troopers is struck down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke fires his pistol at the door control panel, and it explodes. The door begins to slide shut. Three troopers charge forward firing laser bolts, as the door slides to a close behind them, shutting Vader and the other troops out of the docking bay. A stormtrooper lies dead at the feet of his onrushing compatriots. Luke starts for the advancing troops, as Solo and Leia move up the ramp into the pirateship. He fires, hitting a stormtrooper, who crumbles to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks around to see where the voice came from. He turns toward the pirateship, ducking Imperial gunfire from the troopers and races into the ship.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Now's our chance! Go!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Luke) Come on!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Come on! Luke, its too late!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Blast the door! Kid!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Run, Luke! Run!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Han pulls back on the controls and the ship begins to move. The dull thud of laser bolts bouncing off the outside of the ship as Chewie adjusts his controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chewbacca growls in agreement.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I hope the old man got that tractor beam out if commission, or this is going to be a real short trip. Okay, hit it!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Millennium Falcon powers away from the Death Star docking bay, makes a spectacular turn and disappears into the vastness of space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke, saddened by the loss of Obi-Wan Kenobi, stares off blankly as the robots look on. Leia puts a blanket around him protectively, and Luke turns and looks up at her. She sits down beside him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Solo spots approaching enemy ships.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (to Chewie) We're coming up on the sentry ships. Hold 'em off! Angle the deflector shields while I charge up the main guns!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke looks downward sadly, shaking his head back and forth, as the princess smiles comfortingly at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo-Detoo beeps a reply.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han rushes into the hold area where Luke is sitting with the princess.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I can't believe he's gone.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: There wasn't anything you could have done.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Luke) Come on, buddy, we're not out of this yet!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Solo climbs into his attack position in the topside gunport.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke gets up and moves out toward the gunports as Leia heads for the cockpit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke climbs down the ladder into the gunport cockpit, settling into one of the two main laser cannons mounted in large rotating turrets on either side of the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han adjusts his headset as he sits before the controls of his laser cannon, then speaks into the attached microphone.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (to Luke) You in, kid? Okay, stay sharp!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Chewbacca and Princess Leia search the heavens for attacking TIE fighters. The Wookiee pulls back on the speed controls as the ship bounces slightly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Computer graphic readouts form on Solo's target screen, as Han reaches for controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke sits in readiness for the attack, his hand on the laser cannon's control button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Chewbacca spots the enemy ships and barks.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (into intercom) Here they come!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Imperial TIE fighters move towards the Millennium Falcon, one each veering off to the left and right of the pirateship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The stars whip past behind the Imperial pilot as he adjusts his maneuvering joy stick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The TIE fighter races past the Falcon, firing laser beams as it passes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Threepio is seated in the hold area, next to Artoo-Detoo. The pirateship bounces and vibrates as the power goes out in the room and then comes back on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fighter maneuvers in front of Han, who follows it and fires at it with the laser cannon. Luke does likewise, as the fighter streaks into view. The ship has suffered a minor hit, and bounces slightly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two TIE fighters dive down toward the pirateship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke fires at an unseen fighter.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: They're coming in too fast!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Pan with pirateship as two TIE fighters charge through the background. Laserbolts streak from all the craft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ship shudders as a laserbolt hits very close to the cockpit. The Wookiee chatters something to Leia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Full shot of a TIE fighter as it moves fast through the frame, firing on the pirate starship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The two TIE fighters fire a barrage of laserbeams at the pirateship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A laserbolt streaks into the side of the pirateship. The ship lurches violently, throwing poor Threepio into a cabinet fill of small computer chips.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Oooh!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Leia watches the computer readout as Chewbacca manipulates the ship's controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An enemy laserbolt hits the pirateship's control panel, causing it to blow out in a shower of sparks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo-Detoo advances toward the smoking sparking control panel, dousing the inferno by spraying it with fire retardant beeping all the while.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We've lost lateral controls.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't worry, she'll hold together.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to ship) You hear me, baby? Hold together!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke swivels in his gun mount, following the TIE fighter with his laser cannon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Solo aims his laser cannon at the enemy fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fighter streaks in front of the starship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leia watches the TIE fighter ship fly over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fighter heads right for the pirateship, then zooms overhead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke follows the TIE fighter across his field of view, firing laserbeams from his cannon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: fighter dives past the pirateship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke fires at a TIE fighter. At his port, Han follows a fighter in his sights, releasing a blast of laserfire. He connects, and the fighter explodes into fiery dust. Han laughs victoriously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two TIE fighters move toward and over the Millennium Falcon, unleashing a barrage of laserbolts at the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Another TIE fighter moves in on the pirateship and Luke, smiling, fires the laser cannon at it, scoring a spectacular direct hit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han turns and gives Luke a victory wave which Luke gleefully returns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han turns back to his laser cannon.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Got him! I got him!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Great kid! Don't get cocky.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Two more TIE fighters cross in front of the pirateship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: While Chewbacca manipulates the controls, Leia turns, looking over her shoulder out the ports.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: There are still two more of them out there!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: fighter moves up over the pirateship, firing laserblasts at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke and Han look into their respective projected target screens. An Imperial fighter crosses Solo's port, and Han swivels in his chair, following it with blasts from his laser cannon. Another fighter crosses Luke's port, and he reacts in a like manner, the glow of his target screen lighting his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The TIE fighter zooms toward the pirateship, firing destructive blasts at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke fires a laserblast at the approaching enemy fighter, and it bursts into a spectacular explosion. Luke's projected screen gives a readout of the hit. The pirateship bounces slightly as it is struck by the enemy fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The last of the attacking Imperial TIE fighters looms in, firing upon the Falcon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Solo swivels behind his cannon, his aim describing the arc of the TIE fighter. The fighter comes closer, firing at the pirateship, but a well-aimed blast from Solo's laser cannon hits the attacker, which blows up in a small atomic shower of burning fragments.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The princess jumps up and gives Chewie a congratulatory hug.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (laughing) That's it! We did it!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We did it!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Threepio lies on the floor of the ship, completely tangled in the smoking, sparking wires.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo turns his dome from side to side, beeping in response.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Help! I think I'm melting! (to Artoo) This is all your fault.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The victorious Millennium Falcon moves off majestically through space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darth Vader strides into the control room, where Tarkin is watching the huge view screen. A sea of stars is before him.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Are they away?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: They have just made the jump into hyperspace.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're sure the homing beacon is secure aboard their ship? I'm taking an awful risk, Vader. This had better work.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Han, removes his gloves and smiling, is at the controls of the ship. Chewie moves into the aft section to check the damage. Leia is seated near Han.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Frustrated, Leia shakes her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She angrily turns, and as she starts out of the cockpit, passes Luke coming in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke, shaking his head, sits in the copilot seat. He and Han stare out at the vast blackness of space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke says it with finality and looks away. Han smiles at young Luke's jealousy.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Not a bad bit of rescuing, huh? You know, sometimes I even amaze myself.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That doesn't sound too hard. Besides, they let us go. It's the only explanation for the ease of our escape.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Easy... you call that easy?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Their tracking us!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Not this ship, sister.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: At least the information in Artoo is still intact.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's so important? What's he carrying?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The technical readouts of that battle station. I only hope that when the data is analyzed, a weakness can be found. It's not over yet!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It is for me, sister! Look, I ain't in this for your revolution, and I'm not in it for you, Princess. I expect to be well paid. I'm in it for the money!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You needn't worry about your reward. If money is all that you love, then that's what you'll receive!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Your friend is quite a mercenary. I wonder if he really cares about anything... or anyone.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I care!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: So... what do you think of her, Han?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm trying not to, kid!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (under his breath) Good...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Still, she's got a lot of spirit. I don't know, what do you think? Do you think a princess and a guy like me...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The battered pirateship drifts into orbit around the planet Yavin and proceeds to one of its tiny green moons.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: EXT.
location: SPACE AROUND FOURTH MOON OF YAVIN

direction.raw_text: The pirateship soars over the dense jungle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An alert guard, his laser gun in hand, scans the countryside. He sets the gun down and looks toward the temple, barely visible in the foliage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rotting in a forest of gargantuan trees, an ancient temple lies shrouded in an eerie mist. The air is heavy with the fantastic cries of unimaginable creatures. Han, Luke and the others are greeted by the Rebel troops. Luke and the group ride into the massive temple on an armored military speeder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The military speeder stops in a huge spaceship hangar, set up in the interior of the crumbling temple. Willard, the commander of the Rebel forces, rushes up to the group and gives Leia a big hug. Every one is pleased to see her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Willard composes himself, steps back and bows formally.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (holding Leia) You're safe! We had feared the worst.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: When we heard about Alderaan, we were afraid that you were... lost along with your father.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We don't have time for our sorrows, Commander. The battle station has surely tracked us here. (looking pointedly to Han) It's the only explanation for the ease of our escape. You must use the information in this R2 unit to plan the attack. It is our only hope.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The surface of the Death Star ominously approaches the red planet Yavin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grand Moff Tarkin and Lord Vader are interrupted in their discussion by the buzz of the comlink. Tarkin moves to answer the call.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Yes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: We are approaching the planet Yavin. The Rebel base is on a moon on the far side. We are preparing to orbit the planet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A lone guard stands in a tower high above the Yavin landscape, surveying the countryside. A mist hangs over the jungle of twisted green.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dodonna stands before a large electronic wall display. Leia and several other senators are to one side of the giant readout. The low-ceilinged room is filled with starpilots, navigators, and a sprinkling of R2-type robots. Everyone is listening intently to what Dodonna is saying. Han and Chewbacca are standing near the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gold Leader, a rough looking man in his early thirties, stands and addresses Dodonna.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo-Detoo stands next to a similar robot, makes beeping sounds, and turns his head from right to left.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A murmer of disbelief runs through the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke is sitting next to Wedge Antilles, a hotshot pilot about sixteen years old.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The group rises and begins to leave.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The battle station is heavily shielded and carries a firepower greater than half the star fleet. It's defenses are designed around a direct large- scale assault. A small one-man fighter should be able to penetrate the outer defense.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Pardon me for asking, sir, but what good are snub fighters going to be against that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, the Empire doesn't consider a small one-man fighter to be any threat, or they'd have a tighter defense. An analysis of the plans provided by Princess Leia has demonstrated a weakness in the battle station.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The approach will not be easy. You are required to maneuver straight down this trench and skim the surface to this point. The target area is only two meters wide. It's a small thermal exhaust port, right below the main port. The shaft leads directly to the reactor system. A precise hit will start a chain reaction which should destroy the station.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Only a precise hit will set up a chain reaction. The shaft is ray- shielded, so you'll have to use proton torpedoes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's impossible, even for a computer.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's not impossible. I used to bull's- eye womp rats in my T-sixteen back home. They're not much bigger than two meters.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Man your ships! And may the Force be with you!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Death Star begins to move around the planet toward the tiny green moon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tarkin and Vader watch the computer projected screen with interest, as a circle of lights intertwines around one another on the screen showing it's position in relation to Yavin and the forth moon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Orbiting the planet at maximum velocity. The moon with the Rebel base will be in range in thirty minutes.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: This will be a day long remembered. It has seen the end of Kenobi and it will soon see the end of the Rebellion.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke, Threepio and little Artoo enter the huge spaceship hangar and hurry along a long line of gleaming spacefighters. Flight crews rush around loading last-minute armaments and unlocking power couplings. In an area isolated from this activity Luke finds Han and Chewbacca loading small boxes onto an armored speeder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han is deliberately ignoring the activity of the fighter pilots' preparation. Luke is quite saddened at the sight of his friend's departure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke goes off and Han hesitates, then calls to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke turns and sees Han wink at him. Luke lifts his hand in a small wave and then goes off. Han turns to Chewie who growls at his captain,
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over loudspeaker) All flight trooper, man your stations. All flight troops, man your stations.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: So... you got your reward and you're just leaving then?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That's right, yeah! I got some old debts I've got to pay off with this stuff. Even if I didn't, you don't think I'd be fool enough to stick around here, do you? Why don't you come with us? You're pretty good in a fight. I could use you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (getting angry) Come on! Why don't you take a look around? You know what's about to happen, what they're up against. They could use a good pilot like you. You're turning your back on them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What good's a reward if you ain't around to use it? Besides, attacking that battle station ain't my idea of courage. It's more like suicide.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: All right. Well, take care of yourself, Han. I guess that's what you're best at, isn't it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey, Luke... may the Force be with you!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What're you lookin' at? I know what I'm doing.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke, Leia, and Dodonna meet under a huge space fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leia gives Luke a little kiss, turns, and goes off. As Luke heads for his ship, another pilot rushes up to him and grabs his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Leader, a rugged handsome man in his forties, comes up behind Luke and Biggs. He has the confident smile of a born leader.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Leader pats Luke on the back as they stop in front of his fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Leader hurries to his own ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke laughs and shakes his head in agreement. He heads for his ship. As Luke begins to climb up the ladder into his sleek, deadly spaceship, the crew chief, who is working on the craft, points to little Artoo, who is being hoisted into a socket on the back of the fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The crewmen lower Artoo-Detoo into the craft. Now a part of the exterior shell of the starship, the little droid beeps that he is fine. Luke climbs up into the cockpit of his fighter and puts an his helmet. Threepio looks on from the floor of the massive hangar as the crewmen secure his little electronic partner into Luke's X-wing. It's an emotional-filled moment as Artoo beeps good-bye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo beeps in agreement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo whistles his reply. All final preparations are made for the approaching battle. The hangar is buzzing with the last minute activity as the pilots and crewmen alike make their final adjustments. The hum of activity is occasionally trespassed by the distorted voice of the loudspeaker issuing commands. Coupling hoses are disconnected from the ships as they are fueled. Cockpit shields roll smoothly into place over each pilot. A signalman, holding red guiding lights, directs the ships. Luke, a trace of a smile gracing his lips, peers about through his goggles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke is confused at the voice and taps his headphones.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What's wrong?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, it's Han! I don't know, I really thought he'd change his mind.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He's got to follow his own path. No one can choose it for him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I only wish Ben were here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Luke! I don't believe it! How'd you get here... are you going out with us?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Biggs! Of course, I'll be up there with you! Listen, have I got some stories to tell...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Are you... Luke Skywalker? Have you been checked out on the Incom T-sixty- five?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sir, Luke is the best bushpilot in the outer rim territories.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I met your father once when I was just a boy, he was a great pilot. You'll do all right. If you've got half of your father's skill, you'll do better than all right.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Thank you, sir. I'll try.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I've got to get aboard. Listen, you'll tell me your stories when we come back. All right?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I told you I'd make it someday, Biggs.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (going off) You did, all right. It's going to be like old times, Luke. We're a couple of shooting stars that'll never be stopped!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This R2 unit of your seems a bit beat up. Do you want a new one?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Not on your life! That little droid and I have been through a lot together. (to Artoo) You okay, Artoo?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay, easy she goes!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hang on tight,Artoo, you've got to come back.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You wouldn't want my life to get boring, would you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Luke, the Force will be with you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: All that can be seen of the fortress is a lone guard standing on a small pedestal jutting out above the dense jungle. The muted gruesome crying sounds that naturally permeate this eerie purgatory are overwhelmed by the thundering din of ion rockets as four silver starships catapult from the foliage in a tight formation and disappears into the morning cloud cover.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The princess, Threepio, and a field commander sit quietly before the giant display showing the planet Yavin and its four moons. The red dot that represents the Death Star moves ever closer to the system. A series of green dots appear around the fourth moon. A din of indistinct chatter fills the war room.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Stand-by alert. Death Star approaching. Estimated time to firing range, fifteen minutes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Death Star slowly moves behind the massive yellow surface of Yavin in the foreground, as many X-wing fighters flying in formation zoom toward us and out of the frame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Light from a distant sun creates an eerie atmospheric glow around a huge planet, Yavin. Rebel fighters flying in formation settle ominously in the foreground and very slowly pull away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Leader lowers his visor and adjusts his gun sights, looking to each side at his wing men.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: All wings report in.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: One of the Rebel fighters checks in through his mike.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Red Ten standing by.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Biggs checks his fighter's controls, alert and ready for combat.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over Biggs' headset) Red Seven standing by.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Red Three standing by.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Red Six standing by.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over headset) Red Nine standing by.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Red Two standing by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (over headset) Red Eleven standing by.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Red Five standing by.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Artoo-Detoo, in position outside of the fighter, turns his head from side to side and makes beeping sounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lock S-foils in attack position.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The group of X-wing fighters move in formation toward the Death Star, unfolding the wings and locking them in the "X" position.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (over headset) We're passing through their magnetic field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold tight!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke adjusts his controls as he concentrates on the approaching Death Star. The ship begins to be buffeted slightly.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over headset) Switch your deflectors on.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: (over headset) Double front!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The fighters, now X-shaped darts, move in formation. The Death Star now appears to be a small moon growing rapidly in size as the Rebel fighters approach. Complex patterns on the metallic surface begin to become visible. A large dish antenna is built into the surface on one side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wedge is amazed and slightly frightened at the awesome spectacle.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Look at the size of that thing!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over headset) Cut the chatter, Red Two.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Accelerate to attack speed. This is it, boys!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the fighters move closer to the Death Star, the awesome size of the gargantuan Imperial fortress is revealed. Half of the deadly space station is in shadow and this area sparkles with thousands of small lights running in thin lines and occasionally grouped in large clusters; somewhat like a city at night as seen from a weather satellite.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Leader, this is Gold Leader.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over headset) I copy, Gold Leader.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're starting for the target shaft now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Red Leader looks around at his wingmen; the Death Star looming in from behind. Two Y-wing fighters bob back and forth in the background. He moves his computer targeting device into position.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We're in position. I'm going to cut across the axis and try and draw their fire.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Two squads of Rebel fighters peel off. The X-wings dive towards the Death Star surface. A thousand lights glow across the dark grey expanse of the huge station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alarm sirens scream as soldiers scramble to large turbo- powered laser gun emplacements. Electronic drivers rotate the huge guns into position as crew adjust their targeting devices.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Laserbolts streak through the star-filled night. The Rebel X- wing fighters move in toward the Imperial base, as the Death Star aims its massive laser guns at the Rebel forces and fires.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Princess Leia listens to the battle over the intercom. Threepio is at her side.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over war room speaker system) Heavy fire, boss! Twenty-degrees.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) I see it. Stay low.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: An X-wing zooms across the surface of the Death Star.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Technical crews scurry here and there loading last-minute armaments and unlocking power cables.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wedge maneuvers his fighter toward the menacing Death Star.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: wings continue in their attack course on the Death Star.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke nosedives radically, starting his attack on the monstrous fortress. The Death Star surface streaks past the cockpit window.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: This is Red Five; I'm going in!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke's X-wing races toward the Death Star. Laserbolts streak from Luke's weapons, creating a huge fireball explosion on the dim surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Terror crosses Luke's face as he realizes he won't be able to pull out in time to avoid the fireball.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over headset) Luke, pull up!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke's ship emerges from the fireball, with the leading edges of his wings slightly scorched.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you all right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke adjusts his controls and breathes a sigh of relief. Flak bursts outside the cockpit window.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I got a little cooked, but I'm okay.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Rebel fighters continue to strafe the Death Star's surface with laserbolts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Walls buckle and cave in. Troops and equipment are blown in all directions. Stormtroopers stagger out of the rubble. Standing in the middle of the chaos, a vision of calm and foreboding, is Darth Vader. One of his Astro-Officers rushes up to him.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We count thirty Rebel ships, Lord Vader. But they're so small they're evading our turbo-lasers!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We'll have to destroy them ship to ship. Get the crews to their fighters.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Smoke belches from the giant laser guns as they wind up their turbine generators to create sufficient power. The crew rushes about preparing for another blast. Even the troopers head gear is not adequate to protect them from the overwhelming noise of the monstrous weapon. One troopers bangs his helmet with his hand in an attempt to stop the ringing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Leader flies through a heavy hail of flak.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Luke, let me know when you're going in.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Red Leader's X-wing flies past Luke as he puts his nose down and starts his attack dive.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I'm on my way in now...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Watch yourself! There's a lot of fire coming from the right side of that deflection tower.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm on it.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke flings his X-wing into a twisting dive across the horizon and down onto the dim grey surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A shot hurls from Luke's guns. Laserbolts streak toward the onrushing Death Star surface. Several small radar emplacements erupt in flame. Laserfire erupts from a protruding tower on the surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The blurry Death Star surface races past the cockpit window as a big smile sweeps across Luke's face at the success of his run. Flak thunders on all sides of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Death Star superstructure races past Luke as he maneuvers his craft through a wall of laserfire and peels away from the surface towards the heavens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The thunder and smoke of the big guns reverberate throughout the massive structure. Many soldiers rush about in the smoke and chaos, silhouetted by the almost continual flash of explosions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Biggs dives through a forest of radar domes, antennae, and gun towers as he shoots low across the Death Star surface. A dense barrage of laserfire streaks by on all sides.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Imperial star pilots dash in unison to a line of small auxiliary hatches that lead to Imperial TIE fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Princess Leia, surrounded by her generals and aides, paces nervously before a lighted computer table. On all sides technicians work in front of many lighted glass walls. Dodonna watches quietly from one corner. One of the officers working over a screen speaks into his headset.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Squad leaders, we've picked up a new group of signals. Enemy fighters coming your way.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke looks around to see if he can spot the approaching Imperial fighters.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: My scope's negative. I don't see anything.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Death Star's surface sweeps past as Red Leader searches the sky for the Imperial fighters. Flak pounds at his ship.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Keep up your visual scanning. With all this jamming, they'll be on top of you before your scope can pick them up.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Silhouetted against the rim lights of the Death Star horizon, four ferocious Imperial TIE ships dive on the Rebel fighters. Two of the TIE fighters peel off and drop out of frame. Pan with the remaining two TIE ships.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Biggs panics when he discovers a TIE ship on his tail. The horizon in the background twists around as he peels off, hoping to lose the Imperial fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Biggs! You've picked one up... watch it!
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I can't see it! Where is he?!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Biggs zooms off the surface and into space, closely followed by an Imperial TIE fighter. The TIE ship fires several laserbolts at Biggs, but misses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Biggs see the TIE ship behind him and swings around, trying to avoid him.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: He's on me tight, I can't shake him... I can't shake him.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Biggs, flying at high altitude, peels off and dives toward the Death Star surface, but he is unable to lose the TIE fighter, who sticks close to his tail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke is flying upside down. He rotates his ship around to normal attitude as he comes out of his dive.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Hang on, Biggs, I'm coming in.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Biggs and the tailing TIE ship dive for the surface, now followed by a fast-gaining Luke. After Biggs dives out of sight, Luke chases the Imperial fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the foreground, the Imperial fighter races across the Death Star's surface, closely followed by Luke in the background.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is a shot from Luke's X-wing of the TIE ship exploding in a mass of flames.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Got him!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Darth Vader strides purposefully down a Death Star corridor, flanked by Imperial stormtroopers.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Several fighters have broken off from the main group. Come with me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A concerned Princess Leia, Threepio, Dodonna, and other officers of the Rebellion stand around the huge round readout screen, listening to the ship-to-ship communication on the room's loudspeaker.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Pull in! Luke... pull in!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Watch your back, Luke!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: (over headset) Watch your back! Fighter's above you, coming in!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke's ship soars away from the Death Star's surface as he spots the tailing TIE fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The TIE pilot takes aim at Luke's X-wing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Imperial TIE fighter pilot scores a hit on Luke's ship. Fire breaks out on the right side of the X-wing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks out of his cockpit at the flames on his ship.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I'm hit, but not bad.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Smoke pours out from behind Artoo-Detoo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Green laserfire moves past the beeping little robot as his head turns.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Artoo, see what you can do with it. Hang on back there.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke nervously works his controls.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over headset) Red Six...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: In the war room, Leia stands frozen as she listens and worries about Luke.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Can you see Red Five?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) There's a heavy fire zone on this side. Red Five, where are you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke spots the TIE fighter behind him and soars away from the Death Star surface.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I can't shake him!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke's ship soars closer to the surface of the Death Star, an Imperial TIE fighter closing in on him in hot pursuit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Death Star whips below Wedge.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I'm on him, Luke!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: (over headset) Hold on!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wedge dives across the horizon toward Luke and the TIE fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wedge moves his X-wing in rapidly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke reacts frantically.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Blast it! Wedge where are you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The fighter pilot watches Wedge's X-wing approach. Another X- wing joins him, and both unleash a volley of laserfire on the Imperial fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The TIE fighter explodes, filling the screen with white light. Luke's ship can be seen far in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks about in relief.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Thanks, Wedge.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Leia, Threepio, Dodonna and other Rebel officers are listening to the Rebel Fighter's radio transmissions over the war room intercom.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Good shooting, Wedge!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Red Leader...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Gold Leader peels off and starts toward the long trenches at the Death Star surface pole.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: This is Gold Leader. We're starting out attack run.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Three Y-wing fighters of the Gold group dive out of the stars toward the Death Star surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leia and the others are grouped around the screen, as technicians move about attending to their duties.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) I copy, Gold Leader. Move into position.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Three Imperial TIE ships in precise formation dive toward the Death Star surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darth Vader calmly adjusts his control stick as the stars whip past in the window above his head.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Stay in attack formation!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Technicians are seated at the computer readout table.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) The exhaust post is...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ...marked and locked in!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gold Leader approaches the surface and pulls out to skim the surface of the huge station. The ship moves into a deep trench, firing laserbolts. The surface streaks past as laserfire is returned by the Death Star.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gold Five is a pilot in his early fifties with a very battered helmet that looks like it's been through many battles. He looks around to see if enemy ships are near. His fighter is buffeted by Imperial flak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gold Leader races down the enormous trench that leads to the exhaust port. Laserbolts blast toward him in increasing numbers, occasionally exploding near the ship causing it to bounce about.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Switch power to front deflector screens.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Three Y-wing skim the Death Star surface deep in the trench, as laserbolts streak past on all sides.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An exterior surface gun blazes away at the oncoming Rebel fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How many guns do you think, Gold Five.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (over speaker) I'd say about twenty guns. Some on the surface, some on the towers. Leia, Threepio, and the technicians view the projected target screen, as red and blue target lights glow. The red target near the center blinks on and off.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Death Star will be in range in five minutes.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The three Y-wing fighters race toward camera and zoom overhead through a hail of laserfire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gold Leader pulls his computer targeting device down in front of his eye. Laserbolts continue to batter the Rebel craft.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Switching to targeting computer.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Gold Two, a younger pilot about Luke's age, pulls down his targeting eye viewer and adjusts it. His ship shudders under intense laser barrage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the fighters begin to approach the target area, suddenly all the laserfire stops. An eerie clam clings over the trench as the surface whips past in a blur.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Computer's locked. Getting a signal.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The guns... they've stopped!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Gold Five looks behind him.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Stabilize your read deflectors. Watch for enemy fighters.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: They've coming in! Three marks at two ten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three Imperial TIE ships, Darth Vader in the center flanked by two wingmen, dive in precise formation almost vertically toward the Death Star surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darth Vader calmly adjusts his control stick as the stars zoom by.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I'll take them myself! Cover me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Yes, sir.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Three TIE fighters zoom across the surface of the Death Star.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader lines up Gold Two in his targeting computer. Vader's hands grip the control stick as he presses the button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The cockpit explodes around Gold Two. His head falls forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Gold Two's ship explodes, debris is flung out into space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gold Leader looks over his shoulder at the scene.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The three TIE fighters race along in the trench in a tight formation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gold Leader panics.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (into mike) I can't maneuver!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Gold Five, the old veteran, trys to calm Gold Leader.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Stay on target.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Death Star races by outside the cockpit window as he adjusts his targeting device.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We're too close.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The older pilot remains calm.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Stay on target!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Now he's really panicked.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Loosen up!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vader calmly adjusts his targeting computer and pushes the fire button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gold Leader's ship is hit by Vader's laser.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gold Leader explodes in a ball of flames, throwing debris in all directions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gold Five moves in on the exhaust port.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Gold Five to Red Leader...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke looks over his shoulder at the action outside of his cockpit.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over headset) Lost Tiree, lost Dutch.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: I copy, Gold Five.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They came from behind...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One of the engines explodes on Gold Five's Y-wing fighter, blazing out of control. He dives past the horizon toward the Death Star's surface, passing a TIE fighter during his descent. Gold Five, a veteran of countless campaigns, spins toward his death.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks nervously about him at the explosive battle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grant Moff Tarkin and a Chief Officer stand in the Death Star's control room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tarkin turns to the computer readout screen. Flames move around the green disk at the center of the screen, as numbers read across the bottom.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We've analyzed their attack, sir, and there is a danger. Should I have your ship standing by?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Evacuate? In out moment of triumph? I think you overestimate their chances!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Rebel base, three minutes and closing.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Red Leader looks over at his wingmen.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Red Group, this is Red Leader.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Dodonna moves to the intercom as he fiddles with the computer keys.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Rendezvous at mark six point one.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) This is Red Two. Flying toward you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Red Three, standing by.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: (over headset) Red Leader, this is Base One. Keep half your group out of range for the next run.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (over headset) Copy, Base One. Luke, take Red Two and Three. Hold up here and wait for my signal... to start your run. Luke nods his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The X-wing fighters of Luke, Biggs, and Wedge fly in formation high above the Death Star's surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke peers out from his cockpit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two X-wings move across the surface of the Death Star. Red Leader's X-wing drops down to the surface leading to the exhaust port.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Leader looks around to watch for the TIE fighters. He begins to perspire.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: This is it!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Red Leader roams down the trench of the Death Star as lasers streak across the black heavens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A huge remote-control laser cannon fires at the approaching Rebel fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Rebel fighters evade the Imperial laser blasts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Ten looks around for the Imperial fighters.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We should be able to see it by now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: From the cockpits of the Rebel pilots, the surface of the Death Star streaks by, with Imperial laserfire shooting toward them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep your eyes open for those fighters!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's too much interference!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three X-wing fighters move in formation down the Death Star trench.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Red Five, can you see them from where you are?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke looks down at the Death Star surface below.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: No sign of any... wait!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Red Ten looks up and sees the Imperial fighters.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over headset) Coming in point three five.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I see them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Three TIE fighters, Vader flanked by two wingmen, dive in a tight formation. The sun reflects off their dominate solar fins as they loop toward the Death Star's surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Leader pulls his targeting device in front of his eyes and makes several adjustments.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I'm in range.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Red Leader's X-wing moves up the Death Star trench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Target's coming up! Red Leader looks at his computer target readout screen. He then looks into his targeting device.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Just hold them off for a few seconds.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vader adjusts his control lever and dives on the X-wing fighters.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Close up formation.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The three TIE fighters move in formation across the Death Star surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Leader lines up his target on the targeting device cross hairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader and his wingmen zoom down the trench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader rapidly approaches the two X-wings of Red Ten and Red Twelve. Vader's laser cannon flashes below the view of the front porthole. the X-wings show in the center of Vader's computer screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Twelve's X-wing fighter is hit by Vader's laserfire, and it explodes into flames against the trench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Ten works at his controls furiously, trying to avoid Vader's fighter behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : You'd better let her loose.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Leader is concentrating on his targeting device.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Almost there!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . Red Ten panics.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I can't hold them!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vader and his wingmen whip through the trench in pursuit of the Rebel fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader cooly pushes the fire button on his control stick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darth Vader's well-aimed laserfire proves to be unavoidable, and strikes Red Ten's ship. Red Ten screams in anguish and pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Ten's ship explodes and bursts into flames.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grimly, Red Leader takes careful aim and watches his computer targeting device, which shows the target lined up in the cross hairs, and fires.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's away!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An armed Imperial stormtrooper is knocked to the floor from the attack explosion. Other troopers scurrying about the corridors are knocked against the wall and lose their balance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leia and the others stare at the computer screen.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) It's a hit!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Negative.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Red Leader looks back at the receding Death Star. Tiny explosions are visible in the distance.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Negative! It didn't go in. It just impacted on the surface.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Darth Vader peels off in pursuit as Red Leader's X-wing passes the Death Star horizon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader swings his ship around for the next kill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (over headset) Red Leader, we're right above you. Turn to point...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke tries to spot Red Leader. He looks down at the Death Star surface.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: ...oh-five; we'll cover for you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over headset) Stay there...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A wary Red Leader looks about nervously.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: ...I just lost my starboard engine.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke looks excitedly toward Red Leader's X-wing.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over headset) Get set to make your attack run.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vader's gloved hands make contact with the control sticks, and he presses their firing buttons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Red Leader fights to gain control of his ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Laserbolts are flung from Vader's TIE fighter, connecting with Red Leader's Rebel X-wing fighter. Red Leader buys it, creating a tremendous explosion far below. He screams and is destroyed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks out the window of his X-wing at the explosion far below. For the first time, he feels the helplessness of his situation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grand Moff Tarkin casts a sinister eye at the computer screen.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Rebel base, one minute and closing.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Dodonna and Princess Leia, with Threepio beside them, listen intently to the talk between the pilots. The room is grim after Red Leader's death. Princess Leia nervously paces the room.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Biggs, Wedge, let's close it up. We're going in. We're going in full throttle.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The horizon twists as Wedge begins to pull out.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Right with you, boss.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The two X-wings peel off against a background of stars and dive toward the Death Star.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke, at that speed will you be able to pull out in time?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It'll be just like Beggar's Canyon back home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The three X-wings move in, unleashing a barrage of laserfire. Laserbolts are returned from the Death Star.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke's lifelong friend struggles with his controls.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We'll stay back far enough to cover you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Flak and laserbolts flash outside Luke's cockpit window.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over headset) My scope shows the tower, but I can't see the exhaust port! Are you sure the computer can hit it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Death Star laser cannon slowly rotates as it shoots laserbolts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks around for the Imperial TIE fighters. He thinks for a moment and then moves his targeting device into position.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Watch yourself! Increase speed full throttle!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Wedge looks excitedly about for any sign of the TIE fighters.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What about the tower?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: You worry about those fighters! I'll worry about the tower!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke's X-wing streaks through the trench, firing lasers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke breaks into a nervous sweat as the laserfire is returned, knicking one of his wings close to the engine.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (to Artoo) Artoo... that, that stabilizer's broken loose again! See if you can't lock it down!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Artoo works to repair the damages. The canyon wall rushes by in the background, making his delicate task seem even more precarious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two laser cannons are firing on the Rebel fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wedge looks up and sees the TIE ships.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke's targeting device marks off the distance to the target.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader and his wingmen zoom closer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader adjusts his controls and fires laserbolts at two X- wings flying down the trench. He scores a direct hit on Wedge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leia and the others are grouped around the computer board.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) I'm hit! I can't stay with you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Get clear, Wedge.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: You can't do any more good back there!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wedge pulls his crippled X-wing back away from the battle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader watches the escape but issues a command to his wingmen.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Let him go! Stay on the leader!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke's X-wing speeds down the trench; the three TIE fighters, still in perfect unbroken formation, tail close behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Biggs looks around at the TIE fighters. He is worried.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Hurry, Luke, they're coming in much faster this time. I can't hold them!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The three TIE fighters move ever closer, closing in on Luke and Biggs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks back anxiously at little Artoo.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Artoo, try and increase the power!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Ignoring the bumpy ride, flak, and lasers, a beeping Artoo- Detoo struggles to increase the power, his dome turning from side to side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stealthily, the TIE formation creeps closer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader adjusts his control stick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Biggs looks around at the TIE fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks into his targeting device. He moves it away for a moment and ponders its use. He looks back into the computer targeter.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over headset) Hurry up, Luke!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vader and his wingmen race through the Death Star trench. Biggs moves in to cover for Luke, but Vader gains on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Biggs sees the TIE fighter aiming at him.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Wait!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vader squeezes the fire button on his controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Biggs' cockpit explodes around him, lighting him in red.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Biggs' ship bursts into a million flaming bits and scatters across the surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leia and the others stare at the computer board.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke is stunned by Biggs' death. His eyes are watering, but his anger is also growing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grand Moff Tarkin watches the projected target screen with satisfaction.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Rebel base, thirty seconds and closing.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vader takes aim on Luke and talks to the wingmen.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I'm on the leader.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke's ship streaks through the trench of the Death Star.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Princess Leia returns her general's worried and doubtful glances with solid, grim determination. Threepio seems nervous.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Hang on, Artoo!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke concentrates on his targeting device.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three TIE fighters charge away down the trench toward Luke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader's finger's curls around the control stick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke adjusts the lens of his targeting device.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke's ship charges down the trench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke lines up the yellow cross-hair lines of the targeting device's screen. He looks into the targeting device, then starts at a voice he hears.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Use the Force, Luke.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Death Star trench zooms by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks up, then starts to look back into the targeting device. He has second thoughts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A grim determination sweeps across Luke's face as he closes his eyes and starts to mumble Ben's training to himself.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Let go, Luke.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke's fighter streaks through the trench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Force is strong with this one!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader follows Luke's X-wing down the trench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks to the targeting device, then away as he hears Ben's voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke's hand reaches for the control panel and presses the button. The targeting device moves away.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Luke, trust me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Leia and the others stand watching the projected screen.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) His computer's off. Luke, you switched off your targeting computer. What's wrong?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Nothing. I'm all right.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke's ship streaks ever close to the exhaust port.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks at the Death Star surface streaking by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo-Detoo turns his head from side to side, beeping in anticipation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The three TIE fighters, manned by Vader and his two wingmen, follow Luke's X-wing down the trench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader maneuvers his controls as he looks at his doomed target. He presses the fire buttons on his control sticks. Laserfire shoots toward Luke's X-wing fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A large burst of Vader's laserfire engulfs Artoo. The arms go limp on the smoking little droid as he makes a high-pitched sound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks frantically back over his shoulder at Artoo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smoke billows out around little Artoo and sparks begin to fly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Artoo's beeping sounds die out.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I've lost Artoo!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Leia and the others stare intently at the projected screen, while Threepio watches the Princess. Lights representing the Death Star and targets glow brightly.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The Death Star has cleared the planet. The Death Star has cleared the planet.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Tarkin glares at the projected target screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An officer reaches up and pushes buttons on the control panel, as green lighted buttons turn to red.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Rebel base, in range.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You may fire when ready.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Commence primary ignition.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The three TIE fighters zoom down the Death Star trench in pursuit of Luke, never breaking formation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks anxiously at the exhaust port.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader adjusts his control sticks, checking his projected targeting screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke's ship barrels down the trench.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader's targeting computer swings around into position. Vader takes careful aim on Luke's X-wing fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He pushes the fire buttons.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I have you now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The three TIE fighters move in on Luke. As Vader's center fighter unleashes a volley of laserfire, one of the TIE ships at his side is hit and explodes into flame. The two remaining ships continue to move in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks about, wondering whose laserfire destroyed Vader's wingman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader is taken by surprise, and looks out from his cockpit.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vader's wingman searches around him trying to locate the unknown attacker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Han and Chewbacca grin from ear to ear.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (yelling) Yahoo!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Millennium Falcon heads right at the two TIE fighters. It's a collision course.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The wingman spots the pirateship coming at him and warns the Dark Lord.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Look out!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vader's wingman panics at the sight of the oncoming pirate starship and veers radically to one side, colliding with Vader's TIE fighter in the process. Vader's wingman crashes into the side wall of the trench and explodes. Vader's damaged ship spins out of the trench with a damaged wing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader's ship spins out of control with a bent solar fin, heading for deep space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Vader turns round and round in circles as his ship spins into space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Solo's ship moves in toward the Death Star trench.
direction.name: direction
