direction.raw_text: Solo, smiling, speaks to Luke over his headset mike.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (into mike) You're all clear, kid.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Leia and the others listen to Solo's transmission.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (over speaker) Now let's blow this thing and go home!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke looks up and smiles. He concentrates on the exhaust port, then fires his laser torpedoes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke's torpedoes shoot toward the port and seems to simply disappear into the surface and not explode. But the shots do find their mark and have gone into the exhaust port and are heading for the main reactor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke throws his head back in relief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An Imperial soldier runs to the control panel board and pulls the attack lever as the board behind him lights up.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Stand by to fire at Rebel base.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Two X-wings, a Y-wing, and the pirateship race toward Yavin in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Several Imperial soldiers, flanking a pensive Grand Moff Tarkin, busily push control levers and buttons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The rumble of a distant explosion begins.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Standing by.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The Rebel ships race out of sight, leaving the moon-like Death Star alone against a blanket of stars. Several small flashes appear on the surface. The Death Star bursts into a supernova, creating a spectacular heavenly display.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great shot, kid. That was one in a million.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke is at ease, and his eyes are closed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ship rocks back and forth.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Remember, the Force will be with you... always.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Vader's ship spins off into space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Rebel ships race toward the fourth moon of Yavin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke climbs out of his starship fighter and is cheered by a throng of ground crew and pilots. Luke climbs down the ladder as they all welcome him with laughter, cheers, and shouting. Princess Leia rushes toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She throws her arms around Luke and hugs him as they dance around in a circle. Solo runs in toward Luke and they embrace one another, slapping each other on the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke and Han look at one another, as Solo playfully shoves at Luke's face. Leia moves in between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke looks toward the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The fried little Artoo-Detoo is lifted off the back of the fighter and carried off under the worried eyes of Threepio.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Luke! Luke! Luke!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (laughing) Hey! Hey!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (laughing) I knew you'd come back! I just knew it!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Well, I wasn't gonna let you get all the credit and take all the reward.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (laughing) Hey, I knew there was more to you than money.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, no!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, my! Artoo! Can you hear me? Say something! (to mechanic) You can repair him, can't you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We'll get to work on him right away.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You must repair him! Sir, if any of my circuits or gears will help, I'll gladly donate them.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He'll be all right.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Luke, Han, and Chewbacca enter the huge ruins of the main temple. Hundreds of troops are lined up in neat rows. Banners are flying and at the far end stands a vision in white, the beautiful young Senator Leia. Luke and the others solemnly march up the long aisle and kneel before Senator Leia. From one side of the temple marches a shined-up and fully repaired Artoo-Detoo. He waddles up to the group and stands next to an equally pristine Threepio, who is rather awestruck by the whole event. Chewbacca is confused. Dodonna and several other dignitaries sit on the left of the Princess Leia. Leia is dressed in a long white dress and is staggeringly beautiful. She rises and places a gold medallion around Han's neck. He winks at her. She then repeats the ceremony with Luke, who is moved by the event. They turn and face the assembled troops, who all bow before them. Chewbacca growls and Artoo beeps with happiness.
direction.name: direction
